alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 13 at 9:07PM CST until January 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Sioux County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
